Shaptak Square | Vistaara Architects

Project : Shaptak Square
Location : Dhanmondi, Dhaka
Principal Architect: Mustapha Khalid Palash
Associate Architects: Shahzia Islam Anton, Tanjer Ibne Mazher, shamim Azad, Md. Hasan Imam
Consulting Firm : Vistaara Architects (Pvt.) ltd.
Structure: Md. Monayem Hossain
Electrical: Md. Rafiqul Islam
Mechanical: ABM Abdul Kabir
Landscape Design & ID: Vistaara
Sculpture: Prof. Hamiduzzaman Khan
Client: Shaptak Grihayan Ltd.
Client Representatives: Ahsan Ahmed, Md. Hafizur Rahman
Site Area: 1338.29 Sq. M.
Built-up Area: 12,000.00 Sq. M.
Commencement: 2016
Completion: 2022
